 Home

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Poppins|||on|||||” header_font_size=”24px” header_letter_spacing=”0.5px” background_layout=”dark” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”0px||0px||true|false” header_text_align_tablet=”” header_text_align_phone=”” header_text_align_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

About Harry Langenberg

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”gcid-388bea5e-1853-420f-bb0c-1bf7cb437466″ custom_margin=”||34px|||” custom_padding=”||30px|||” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-388bea5e-1853-420f-bb0c-1bf7cb437466%22:%91%22background_color%22%93}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”30px||30px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_heading title=”Harry Langenberg” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” title_level=”h2″ title_font_size=”40px” custom_margin=”||15px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_heading][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|||on|||||” text_letter_spacing=”3px” custom_margin=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding=”0px||15px||false|false” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″ text_font_size=”14px”]

CO-FOUNDER, MANAGING PARTNER

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#1C50A4″ divider_weight=”8px” divider_weight_tablet=”7px” divider_weight_phone=”7px” divider_weight_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.22.0″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”12%” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”5px||5px||true|false” hover_enabled=”0″ module_alignment_tablet=”center” module_alignment_phone=”left” module_alignment_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” sticky_enabled=”0″ max_width_phone=”20%” max_width_tablet=”12%”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Roboto Flex||||||||” text_text_color=”gcid-a9d8e14e-2f78-408a-a83c-506939196b52″ text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.72em” background_layout=”dark” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-a9d8e14e-2f78-408a-a83c-506939196b52%22:%91%22text_text_color%22%93}”]

As a founder of Affordable Tax Relief, I am blessed to be surrounded by an amazing team of individuals who are passionate about making a positive impact on the lives of others. Having spent the last twelve years delivering solutions in the consumer finance industry, I know that a great services Company is a reflection of the talent and efforts of its individual team members. Affordable’s management team is first class and this is reflected in the great results we are obtaining for our clients every day. 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://affordabletaxrelief.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/harry-langenberg-photo.jpg” alt=”Harry Langenberg | Co-Founder” title_text=”harry-langenberg-photo” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”center” align_last_edited=”on|tablet” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” width_tablet=”” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”1px|3px||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”40px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

While I was fortunate to have attended the Wharton School of Business at the University of Pennsylvania, upon starting my career, I had a pretty rude awakening of my lack of knowledge about personal finance. For several years after college I faced some stressful times making ends meet, living paycheck to paycheck, and all while having no good planning in place for the future. I recognized that if I was unaware of basic financial concepts such as insurance, credit, savings, and tax planning… that many other people must be in the same boat as well. I saw firsthand that there was a lack of professional financial services providers focused on the folks who often need good help the most, and my companies have set about to change that.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://affordabletaxrelief.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/wharton_school_u_penn.jpg” alt=”Wharton School of Business at the University of Pennsylvania” title_text=”wharton_school_u_penn” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Roboto Flex||||||||” custom_margin=”||-1px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

In 2003, I left a lucrative job on Wall Street at Merrill Lynch with the desire to make a much bigger difference on Main Street. After many years of building, we currently employ nearly 500 staff at our headquarters in Santa Ana, CA, where our mission is to help people overcome financial challenges. Now having worked hard to bring professional financial services to the underserved for over 10 years, my companies have been able to help tens of thousands of Americans with a variety of financial programs. Currently we assist clients with creditor negotiation, tax resolution services, obtaining loans and providing financial information and advice. We are always looking to add more beneficial services in the future and invest in areas where we can do more.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Libre Caslon Text||||||||” text_font_size=”17px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding=”10px||10px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

“Dealing with consumer’s finances is a sensitive topic and education is vital. As the number of enrolled clients increase each month, we will continue to build a solid, knowledgeable team to support the demand for our services” — Harry Langenberg

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

At Affordable Tax Relief, the client comes first and this is reflected in our core values. We are also serious about taking good care of our staff, and our team enjoys a variety of employment benefits, company outings and shared experiences together. Over our history, we’ve also aimed to make a difference in our community, not only to help others, but to set a positive example to our staff, partners and neighbors. Every year, our whole team participates in hosting and supporting community events at the locations of a handful of local charities – these events are a staff favorite.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

At Affordable Tax Relief, we are blessed to have such a capable and motivated staff. Our philosophy is that clients come first and everyone is focused on getting our message out and seeing our clients and partners succeed. With satisfied clients and an appreciative staff, the rest of the pieces have come together nicely for the firm.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/Affordable-tax-relief-building.jpg” alt=”Affordable Tax Relief Building” title_text=”Affordable-tax-relief-building” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Libre Caslon Text||||||||” text_font_size=”17px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”20px||20px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

“Our major growth and success comes from the dedication, hard work and integrity of our entire staff.” — Harry Langenberg

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://affordabletaxrelief.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/Harry-Langenberg-google-plus.jpg” alt=”Harry Langenberg and Langenberg Jr.” title_text=”Harry-Langenberg-google-plus” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Outside of work, I’m very lucky to have a beautiful wife and two young boys. We enjoy getting out to the local parks, beaches, sports fields and even for the occasional boat ride on the weekends. I’m very active in my alumni community and several social groups, and am always trying to find a little more time for exercise and hobbies, including running, golf and tennis.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” link_option_url_new_window=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”]

visit: HarryLangenberg.com

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_social_media_follow _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_social_media_follow_network social_network=”linkedin” url=”https://www.linkedin.com/pub/harry-langenberg/2/22/a77″ icon_color=”#CECECE” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” background_enable_color=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” follow_button=”off” url_new_window=”on”]linkedin[/et_pb_social_media_follow_network][/et_pb_social_media_follow][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#f9f9f9″ global_module=”12172″ saved_tabs=”all” locked=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row admin_label=”TrustPilot Carousel” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”50px||50px||true|false” custom_padding=”10px||10px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]
Trustpilot
[/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ disabled_on=”on|on|off” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”rgba(234,234,234,0.5)” custom_margin=”70px|auto|60px|auto|false|false” custom_padding=”20px||20px|30px|true|false” border_color_all=”#1C50A4″ border_width_left=”6px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” header_2_text_color=”#1C50A4″ header_2_font_size=”22px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Let Affordable Tax Relief Help

Call 1-800-536-0734 for a free consultation.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_button button_text=”GET TAX RELIEF” button_alignment=”right” button_alignment_tablet=”center” button_alignment_phone=”center” button_alignment_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_class=”lightbox-trigger-help” _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”6ead079b-43da-4313-8700-0192b4421332″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”14px” button_text_color=”#040011″ button_bg_color=”#7CDA24″ button_border_width=”0px” button_border_color=”#0C71C3″ button_border_radius=”60px” button_letter_spacing=”0.1px” button_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” button_icon=”E||divi||400″ custom_margin=”5px|30px|5px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”10px|35px|10px|35px|true|true” custom_padding_tablet=”15px|45px|15px|45px|false|true” custom_padding_phone=”15px|45px|15px|45px|true|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” animation_style=”fade” button_text_size_tablet=”16px” button_text_size_phone=”14px” button_text_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” button_letter_spacing__hover=”0.3px” button_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”on|hover”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row disabled_on=”off|off|on” _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” module_alignment=”center” module_alignment_tablet=”” module_alignment_phone=”center” module_alignment_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” header_2_text_color=”#1C50A4″ header_2_font_size=”22px” text_orientation=”center” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Let Affordable Tax Relief Help

Call 1-800-536-0734 for a free consultation.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_text=”GET TAX RELIEF” button_alignment=”center” button_alignment_tablet=”center” button_alignment_phone=”center” button_alignment_last_edited=”on|phone” disabled_on=”off|off|off” module_class=”lightbox-trigger-help” _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”6ead079b-43da-4313-8700-0192b4421332″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”15px” button_text_color=”#040011″ button_bg_color=”#7CDA24″ button_border_width=”0px” button_border_color=”#0C71C3″ button_border_radius=”60px” button_letter_spacing=”0.1px” button_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” button_icon=”E||divi||400″ custom_margin=”5px|30px|5px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”20px|20px||20px|false|true” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_padding=”10px|40px|10px|40px|true|true” custom_padding_tablet=”15px|45px|15px|45px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”15px|45px|15px|45px|true|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” animation_style=”fade” button_text_size_tablet=”16px” button_text_size_phone=”14px” button_text_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” button_letter_spacing__hover=”0.3px” button_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”on|hover”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
